body: Vietnamnet publishes Tu Uyen's list of top education stories of 2010 in Vietnam. The top story is about Ngo Bao Chau, a famous mathematic professor.
original_body: Vietnamnet publishes Tu Uyen's list of top education stories of 2010 in Vietnam. The top story is about Ngo Bao Chau, a famous mathematic professor.
title: Vietnam: Top education stories of 2010

sentence: Vietnamnet publishes Tu Uyen's list of top education stories of 2010 in Vietnam.
The top story is about Ngo Bao Chau, a famous mathematic professor.
